**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,jsonc}: bash -c 'files="$@"; echo "$files" | tr " " "\n" | grep -vE "(src/assets/icons|src/components/ui)" | tr "\n" " " | xargs -r biome check --write' --
**/*.{css,scss,html}: echo 'Skipping CSS/HTML files - no linting configured'
**/*.{md,mdx}: echo 'Skipping Markdown files - no linting configured'
